[APPLY] We would like to formally apply again for the open place, and we can confirm enrollment immediately if offered.

Details you requested:
1) Preferred start date window: we can start immediately (as soon as you can offer), and we are also fine with any start date within the next 1–4 weeks if that is easier for your intake schedule.
2) Days/hours needed: fully flexible. We can do full-time Mon–Fri (typical nursery hours) or any part-time pattern you prefer; we can adapt to your availability.
3) Child’s age/DOB: our child is nursery-age; we can provide the exact date of birth and any supporting documents the same day—please tell me the preferred format (email/upload/in-person).
4) Paperwork/deposit: confirmed—we can complete registration paperwork and pay any required deposit within 24 hours (certainly within 24–48 hours) of an offer.

If there is any remaining item you need to verify eligibility (forms, proof of address, immunization record, etc.), please send the checklist and we will submit everything immediately.

Thank you again for considering us as you work through the priority order.

- Child’s full name + exact DOB
- Proof of address
- Immunization/health record (or a note on when it will be provided)
- Parent/guardian IDs and emergency contacts
- Preferred start date (earliest feasible) and any non-negotiable schedule constraints (if truly none, please confirm “no constraints”)
